Subject: 2024 EOY Gift List
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

We hope this message finds you well.

 

As we approach the end of the year, we would like to kindly remind everyone to update their end-of-year gift list. This will greatly assist us in preparing and ensuring that all gifts are distributed before the year comes to a close.

Please make sure to send us the updated list by December 6th at the latest. 

 

Thank you for your cooperation.

 

Best regards,
